data.title: Bolpur College: Contact Details, Facilities
data.meta_description: Get complete details on Bolpur College facilities, contact details, latest updates and campus details.
data.text:
Placements & Internships : The seminar is good and we can attend every seminar with lots of enjoyment everyone on this campus is very liberal.

Entrance Exams & Admissions : the cutoff is 70% and everyone can study in this college.one can get easily admitted to this colleg

Placements & Internships : The seminar is good and we can attend every seminar with lots of enjoyment everyone on this campus is very liberal.

Entrance Exams & Admissions : the cutoff is 70% and everyone can study in this college.one can get easily admitted to this college.

Fees & Scholarships : No loans needed for studying in this college and course fee per year is very low.

Academics & Faculty : Daily class and college timing are 10:30 am to 3:30 pm.and we have some practical classes daily.

College Infrastructure & Hostel Facilities : Wifi is there and hostel fee is very low and the cost of the food from canteen is very low.

Clubs & Associations : The society and the environment of a college campus are very good. our main festival is independence day and republic day

Fees & Scholarships : My course fee is INR 2,000 per annum. Vivekananda Scholarships are available. 20% of entire students get a scholarship every year. There is no need for loans.

Academics & Faculty : Class starts at 10:30 am and ends at 3:00 pm. Quality of

Fees & Scholarships : My course fee is INR 2,000 per annum. Vivekananda Scholarships are available. 20% of entire students get a scholarship every year. There is no need for loans.

Academics & Faculty : Class starts at 10:30 am and ends at 3:00 pm. Quality of teaching is good.

College Infrastructure & Hostel Facilities : Hostels are available. I don't know about the availability of Pg. The food in the college is average. Classrooms, labs are clean and well maintained. There is no Wifi connection.

Clubs & Associations : Many festivals are held at this college. Every year our college organize yearly sports, Freshers for new students and small programs. Yes, we enjoyed our college life.

Placements & Internships : I have not done any internship. Average salary offered is Rs 12000 per month. Alumni network is good.

Academics & Faculty : Daily routine is very useful for a

Placements & Internships : I have not done any internship. Average salary offered is Rs 12000 per month. Alumni network is good.

Academics & Faculty : Daily routine is very useful for all students. The time is beautifully arranged, it helps us to attain the class. Our teachers are very helpful and good in nature, they solve our problems with very ease. Over all its very good experience being a student of this college.

Fees & Scholarships : My course fee is about Rs 3000 per year. There are some scholarship options are available. Average students who get scholarship are -3. State bank gives student loan.

College Infrastructure & Hostel Facilities : There is one boys hostel. Hostels are good. Fee is approx Rs 700 per month. Outside our college Visva Bharati naional University is situated which gives us various options of PG. Cost is approx Rs 1600 per month. The food is very hygienic and tasty . The cost is Rs 50 per plate of meal. Our classrooms are large mostly and have got an atmosphere, We have two separated labs and every student gets their own desks.

Placements & Internships : Internships are some thing which depends on our networking. There is not such internship offers by college.But due to the flexible schedule we can take up outside internships. Placement Cell is active. Regarding the alumni network- every year an Alu

Placements & Internships : Internships are some thing which depends on our networking. There is not such internship offers by college.But due to the flexible schedule we can take up outside internships. Placement Cell is active. Regarding the alumni network- every year an Alumni Meet takes place where all the alumne takes part.

Academics & Faculty : The course structure of my college is very good. It is same in every other honours college. Academic schedule is half yearly and full term which gives us ample time to give tests, assignments, submit projects and also to have fun and do other extra-curricular activities. Teachers of department are really helpful with course materials, references and guidancE

Fees & Scholarships : My college fees is 1200 yearly. There are financial aid options for Physically-disabled students and also other grants which makes it easier for students of different income classes to study here. Students can also avail the different scholarships provided by the government.

College Infrastructure & Hostel Facilities : The college has a very modern infrastructure with front lawns, clean classrooms, canteen. One key point is the presence of a Coffee Shop which is of supreme importance to students here in the college. The college is located on the main bus route which connects to the eastern states of india. Also one can get autos, rickshaws for travelling to nearby places.

Clubs & Associations : My college has several societies-art club,dance club,music club,coders club,trekking club..a school for the poor children living near by where the students of our college teach
